Agreed, although ill be rooting TSM all the way.  I'm really interested to see what happens when TSM and Fnatic face off, you know with the whole "NA vs. EU" deal, especially if they end up playing a best of 5 in the bracket stage.  TSM, bring home some glory for NA please :)
Or just not make it out of groups
I'm all for NA pride, but just the level of competition in the regions I think NA will win a very close Bo5. :3
TSM is gonna crush fnatic. EU is really sloppy this season
they certainly did
he started at second cause we all already know who is taking first lol
you wish

Why would I need to wish? He didn't put SKT on the list so obviously he started from second place down because he knew SKT had it in the bag.

Unless you seriously believe that NA/EU/LMS/Wildcard will beat SKT.
well played my friend, well played.
i agree

1st- TSM
2nd- SKT
3rd/4th - EDG/AHQ
5th/6th - Beşiktaş/Fnatic 

Leggo!
Maybe you should prepare to wipe away the tears of crushing defeat, I like NA as much as the next dude but you're fcking stoned if you think TSM will be first.
TSM won first for IEM Katawice.

Yeah, and WE turned around hard core w/ the new roster so it wasn't just that they beat the worst team in china. However, let's be honest, WE doesn't hold a candle to EDG. As for GE Tigers they are a solid team, but SKT seems to have found some more consistency and some strength in this meta, so they are probably miles ahead of where GE Tigers were at Katawice in terms of strength. There are definitely going to be some great games, but TSM will have to get extremely lucky and play the best they have all season if they stand a chance to take the whole thing.

No one would need to be stoned to guess TSM, every team has an equal chance except the wildcards you would have to be stoned to get an advantage to teams that haven't played a in a LONG time/never. Every team but the wildcard has a chance at finals. upsets can and will happen
TL;DR Any team can win (highly unlikely the wildcard team) don't down vote peoples hopes :/
Lol.....I just saw your reply. Sorry bro RIP TSM

im more surprised that you put EDG 1st and SKT 2nd

for me it's

1st-SKT
2nd-EDG
3rd/4th-TSM&Fnatic
5th/6th-AHQ&Besiktas

also knowing TSM is bad in playing teams for the first time and beeing vulnerable to chesse, i can see Fnatic getting 3rd and TSM 4th place

either way im excited for this MSI, NA vs EU will be the shit talk festival but i don't care, may the best team win (i still think this will be TSM but anything can happen with Fnatic)
Nahh i would rank EDG ahead of SKT. The only advantage SKT have is mid lane. Everywhere else EDG has superior or equal players.

SKT would have a better top, even mid (PawN might even be slightly better, probably is), even-ish jg (I'd say ClearLove is better), worse ADC (though Bang can be excellent sometimes) and even/ slightly better support. it's all down to the team play and map control, all of the players are pretty equal

WAIT WAIT WAIT.  You are saying that Clearlove is superior to Bengi? Counselor, no more drugs for this man. Bang v Deft, I'll give you. Koro v Marin...is Marin as the superior top laner.

So Easyhoon v U is easyhoon or Easyhoon v Pawn is pretty even. Faker v U is faker. Faker v Pawn is really dependent on the the junglers.
no, you're the one that's hallucinating. Clearlove is superior to Bengi and Koro is superior to Marin lol gtfo.

I like how you ignored the rest, you must be drinking the Froskurrin koolaid for Clearlove. And Marin is going to dominate Koro.

Please no more trollorino.

did you really just say Bang is better than Deft? You sir, who got everything else right, are very very very wrong for that. Bang gets carried by SKT, hes a supportive ad. Deft is a teamfight god. You should call him Lord Deft from now on, sir.

No I gave him the Bang v Deft. See:

> Bang v Deft, I'll give you.

I told him he was on drugs for the Clearlove > Bengi or Koro v Marin.

I in no way endorsed or suggested that Bang was greater than Lord Deft.
TSM > Fnc TSM is the stronger team in general FNC went 3-2 against UOL, and they can play against new teams they fixed that (ex. YFW, WE)
FINALLY!!! FAKER VS BJERG
*easyhoon vs Bjerg
I think with the one sub rule SKT will take T0M rather than easyhoon
Easyhoon is confirmed as a sub, so T0M will not be attending
TSM fanboys will be so disapointed
EU fanboys will be even more disappointed. #NEVERFORGET
Oh God ! I hope not.
More like Faker vs Pawn.
But I'm really worry about Pawn's illness...
There will be a WAR in midlane! Faker can get some sweet, sweet revenge on Pawn too:D
Doesn't matter who's first EU will be last
based on what exactly? last year's worlds or iem? previous results mean nothing. what matters is how each team performs at the event
But according to EU fanboys around the world, winning season 1 "worlds" automatically means EU is better than NA..
Where are the GE Tigers??????
Lost 3-0 to SKT this morning without Faker and Bengi

So what games are y'all looking forward to?

Tops for me would be, in order:

EDG vs SKT (Pawn vs Faker, hell yeah!)

TSM vs Fnatic (EU vs NA bragging rights!)

AHQ vs Everyone (Curious to see how LMS stacks up internationally)

TSM vs SKT (I think EDG is probably gonna win it all and be strongest by a good deal, but I'm really hoping NA can keep up w/ Korea and maybe be second strongest region.)

What are your thoughts? What did I overlook?

"In the Bracket Stage, the No. 1 and No. 4 seeds will play in one Semifinal while the No. 2 and No. 3 seeds will play in the other. The winner of the Bracket Stage is the champion of the event."

Just to add, the winner of the semi-final match between teams no. 1 and no. 4 (Bo5) will meet the winner of the semi-final match between teams no. 2 and no. 3 (Bo5) for the finals in a Bo5 format as well. Winner of that match will be crowned 2015 MSI champion. No match for 3rd place will occur.

Am I right?
what do U guys mean by saying EDG or TSM will win the series? I am a fan of Cloud 9, but you have to admit that SKT is gonna win the series. They had two sub players for LCK final and won 3:0
U guys have to remember that SKT didn't lose a game in last year's all star
EDG will win MSI. Its about time the Korean decline begins.
Korean decline (promotes a Chinese team with 2 Korean World champions). Must be a troll.

O wow really?  Was that before or after they didn't even make it to worlds?  What midlaner was it that stomped faker last year?  What 3 teams were better then skt in kr last year?  Hmm that midlaner I think his name is Pawn? Oo yea hes the guy on EDG now..Durka...Durka
